description.0: A long-handled drill that you can rarely find nowadays. It was often used in delving and in carving stones.

0.0: When the wielder is healed or heals others, they will gain a Unity's Symbol that lasts 30s, up to a maximum of 3 Symbols. When using their Elemental Skill or Burst, all Symbols will be consumed and the Struggle effect will be granted for 10s. For each Symbol consumed, gain <cryo>3%</cryo> ATK and <cryo>7%</cryo> All Elemental DMG Bonus. The Struggle effect can be triggered once every 15s, and Symbols can be gained even when the character is not on the field.
